Hello! My name is Akewak jeba and I am a researcher passionate about microbes, bioinformatics, humanities and open science.

I'm currently a researcher at the [Turku University](https://utu.fi/) at [Turku Data Science group](https://datascience.utu.fi/)

I have contributed to different projects in the development of different R package tools in Microbiome and humanities.

You can find more information about [my work](projects.qmd), what I'm [writing about](blog.qmd), and how to get [in contact](contact.qmd) with me!
